New Delhi

New Delhi, Oct. 31 -- Amazon Great Indian Festival sale began on 2 October and the one-month festive sales have finally concluded. The e-commerce giant has revealed some statistics about the sale.

Here are the some of highlights Great Indian Festival revealed by the e-commerce company:
